## Description and Rationale

We are working as researchers at a University and are actively working on AI regarding aviation systems. One of our projects is about sustainable AI in aviation and this challenge seems like a good fit. It will be a good opportunity to challenge ourselves and learn more.

## Details

* Type: Academia
* Country: Germany

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(gt)

gt(tibble::tribble(
  ~id, ~forename,   ~surname,              ~affiliation,
   1L,   "Recep", "Ayyildiz", "University of Stuttgart",
   2L, "Yassine",   "Akhiat", "University of Stuttgart"
  )
) |> cols_label(id = md("**ID**"), forename = md("**Forename**"), surname ~ md("**Surname**"), affiliation ~ md("**Affiliation**"))
```
